events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your online store but it doesn't fit at all and I would like to request a refund for the item.
The support system has classified this issue under the Refund cluster based on the customer's request for money back.
An agent has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request to provide assistance and next steps.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I understand you'd like to request a refund for your jacket. I am here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been returned or if you need assistance with the return process?
My order number is 123456789. I have not yet returned the jacket because I wanted to confirm the refund policy first.
Thank you for the information. You can return the jacket within 30 days for a full refund. I will send you a prepaid return label to your email shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and for sending the return label. I'll pack the jacket and ship it back as soon as I get the label.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your payment method within 5-7 business days.
Just following up to ensure that you have received the refund amount and that everything is satisfactory on your end.
Yes, I have received the refund amount today. Thank you very much for your help and smooth process.
We have sent you a survey to rate your support experience. We appreciate your feedback to improve our service.
The customer has completed the satisfaction survey and rated the support experience as excellent with positive comments.
The refund case has been formally closed following confirmation of refund receipt and positive feedback from the customer.
The case file has been archived for record-keeping according to company policy after successful resolution.
